page.title: 11Recreation
page.content: here are no recreational facilities in ither Deene or Deenethorpe, but there are facilities for leisure at Priors Hall Golf Course,in the south of the study area...where there are bars and a restaurant, in addition to the golf club. Until the 1970's there was a public house at Deene (The Seahorse),and this became a club before closing. Some residents believed there was a need for the pub to re-open, but this seems to be unlikely. The nearest recreational facilities are at Corby,and in the nearby villages of Weldon and Bulwick. Only one person interviewed had been to the theatre in the past year, three had been to a sporting event...and two said they had not been away from their own village for more than a few hours in the past five years.
